intro: 一个十分强大的训练家向你走来…

buck.intro_dialogue:
哟，训练师！我叫麦可。$我有一个非常棒的提议，
适合像你这样强大的训练师！$我随身带着两颗稀有的宝可梦蛋，
但我想让别人来照顾一颗。$如果你能向我证明你作为训练师的实力，
我会给你更稀有的蛋！
buck.decline:
害，看起来你的
队伍状态不佳。$来，让我来帮忙。

cheryl.intro_dialogue:
你好，我是芽米。$我有一个特别有趣的请求，
因为看起来你是一位强大的训练师。$我随身带着两颗稀有的神奇宝贝蛋，
但我想让别人照顾一颗。$如果你能向我证明你作为训练师的实力，
我会给你更稀有的蛋！
cheryl.decline:
我明白，看起来你的团队
目前状态不佳。$来，让我来帮忙。

marley.intro_dialogue:
...@d{64} I'm Marley.$I have an offer for you...$I'm carrying two Pokémon Eggs with me,
but I'd like someone else to care for one.$If you're stronger than me,
I'll give you the rarer Egg.
marley.decline:
... I see.$Your Pokémon look hurt...
Let me help.

mira.intro_dialogue:
Hi! I'm Mira!$Mira has a request
for a strong trainer like you!$Mira has two rare Pokémon Eggs,
but Mira wants someone else to take one!$If you show Mira that you're strong,
Mira will give you the rarer Egg!
mira.decline:
Aww, no battle?
That's okay!$Here, Mira will heal your team!

riley.intro_dialogue:
I'm Riley.$I have an odd proposal
for a strong trainer such as yourself.$I'm carrying two rare Pokémon Eggs with me,
but I'd like to give one to another trainer.$If you can prove your strength to me,
I'll give you the rarer Egg!
riley.accept:
That look you have...
Let's do this.
riley.decline: I understand, your team looks beat up.$Here, let me help with that.

title: 训练家试炼
description:
不管你选择什么，此训练家都会给你一个蛋。
然而，如果你能击败他，就会获得一个更稀有的蛋。

1.label: Accept the Challenge
1.tooltip:
(-) Tough Battle
(+) Gain a @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{Very Rare Egg}
